properties.areaDesc: Columbia, PA; Clinton, PA; Lycoming, PA; Northumberland, PA; Union, PA; Centre, PA; Montour, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 5:52AM EST until January 8 at 6:45AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania...
East central Centre County in central Pennsylvania...
Southern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania...
Northwestern Montour County in central Pennsylvania...
Northwestern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania...
Union County in central Pennsylvania...
Southeastern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania...

* Until 645 AM EST.

* At 552 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from Cogan Station to near Milesburg, moving east at 55
mph.

HAZARD...Whiteout conditions and icy roadways. Zero visibility in
heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30
mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

* For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the
Snow Shoe and Danville exits, specifically from mile markers 153 to
216.

This includes the following Interstates...
Interstate 99 from mile markers 84 to 85.
Interstate 180 from mile markers 1 to 29.

Locations impacted include...
Williamsport, Lock Haven, Milton, Bellefonte, Lewisburg,
Montoursville, Jersey Shore, Mifflinburg, Carroll, Woodward, Lamar,
Muncy, Watsontown, Hughesville, Zion, Mill Hall, Montgomery,
Linntown, Avis and Dunnstown.
properties.instruction:
Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes
your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra
time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead
to accidents.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 6:45 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
